name: Dream Beat
description:
You can dream into the future, allowing the possibility of alternate realities.

You wield rhythm, a pattern of time, to progress throughout your dreams.

Which paths will you come across?

_________C______________________SPACEBAR___________________M_________

                

Tap the notes to the sound of the music as they fall down the screen. 70% for a level will let you on to the next vision.

Character Drafts +Background art + BGM - Love Toogood

Art + SFX + Code + Start screen BGM - Isaac Chase
